import React from "react"; import Container from "../../components/Container"; import Col from "../../components/Col" import Row from "../../components/Row" import Mount from "../../images/mt_tam_real.jpg" const About = () => (

Chitananda, born in California, living and working in the Bay Area and meditating daily for 14 years in a rich Indo Tibetan Buddhist lineage. As it turns out, meditation is powerful for those interested in career success.
) export default About;
